smprsc : Summary module description sentence

Brief description:
Brief module description. There could be one or more sentences in this short module description.
Detailed description:
Detailed module description.
Used files:
OPTIONAL. If files are used, for each one, name, and usage description, as below.
filename 1 : usage description of fileName1
filename 2 : usage description of fileName2

Environment:
OPTIONAL. If needed, environmental variables accessed by the program. For each variable, name, and usage description, as below.
envVar1 : usage description of envVar1
envVar2 : usage description of envVar2

Examples:
OPTIONAL but STRONGLY RECOMMENDED. Code examples if needed. You can make an example list with the \li marker.
Brief example description. 
Insert code for example
See also:
OPTIONAL. See also section in which you can refer other documented entities. Using the \sa marker, doxygen will create the link automatically. An example is given below.

<entity to refer>

Bug:
OPTIONAL. Known bugs list if it exists.

Bug 1 : bug 1 description

Bug 2 : bug 2 description

Todo:
OPTIONAL. Things to forsee list, if needed.

Action 1 : action 1 description

Action 2 : action 2 description
